doc.field: Brooklyn Historical Society Genealogical vertical files
Brooklyn Historical Society Genealogical vertical files

This collection was compiled by Brooklyn Historical Society staff to organize their genealogical research and the research of other professional and amateur genealogists. The collection includes correspondence, newspaper clippings, notes, pedigree charts, and a limited number of photographs.

This collection was compiled by Brooklyn Historical Society staff to organize their genealogical research and the research of other professional and amateur genealogists. The collection includes correspondence, newspaper clippings, notes, pedigree charts, and a limited number of photographs.

This collection includes compiled genealogical research, including correspondence, newspaper clippings, notes, pedigree charts, and a limited number of photographs. The files represent families from Long Island and the North East region of the United States, and also reflect on the institutional history of the Brooklyn Historical Society. Materials in the collections are both originals and reproductions.
This collection was compiled by Brooklyn Historical Society staff to organize their genealogical research and the research of other professional and amateur genealogists.
This is an artificial collection, compiled by Brooklyn Historical Society staff at an unknown date.
